Text.Language: Aukocf au,af qen pim~hau: v/et,/ cabol n~]baki: e~taujoc qen toumetath/t: je vai f~nas~twnf an je.
He was shrouded and placed in the tomb, which was outside the city, they said in their ignorance, He can not rise.
